name: Motocross Madness 2
description:
Motocross Madness 2 is a racing-arcade game developed by Rainbow Studios. It came out on 01-01-2000. Microsoft Studios published the game. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play Motocross Madness 2 on PC.
Howard Phillips produced the game. It was directed by Eugene Jarvis and Jordan Weisman. It was scored by David Lowmiller.
